root.name: Air Taxi
root.description: Air Taxi is very much a shareware clone of Space Taxi for the Commodore 64, with the game play being mostly unchanged. Players are required to pick up customers from numbered platforms and to drop them off on another numbered platform. As with Space Taxi, the game included audible speech from customers to instruct the player which platform to drop them off on.Unlike Space Taxi, Air Taxi included multi-player allowing up to 5 players to play through the levels.
